constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: MVKTC Name: Motor Vehicle Restricted Area (KTC)
KTCAAP Name: Kingston Town Centre AAP
KEYACH Name: Kingston Town Centre Key Area of Change
CONARA Name: Kingston Old Town Conservation Area
KEYACO Name: Kingston Old Town Conservation Area

AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT
LBCASE LB Address: 41MARKET PLACE  (east side)KINGSTONLB Grade: GD2LB Ref: 6/34

description: Variation of Condition 1 (Plans) of Listed Building Consent 19/02575/LBC (Proposed repair works of 41 Market Place, including roof alterations and cleaning, re-pointing and redecoration works.) for substitution of Drawings 3 (Rev A) and 4 (Rev A)  with Drawings 3 (Rev B) and 4 (Rev B)
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall be commenced within 3 years from the date of the grant of the original permission (19/02575/LBC). Reason:  As required by Section 18 of the Planning (Listed Buildings and Conservation Areas) Act 1990 as amended by Section 51 of the Planning and Compulsory Purchase Act 2004.

The method of repointing hereby approved as part of this permission shall be traditionally undertaken by hand methods only, using a lime mortar tinted to a matching colour to that as existing. Reason: In order that the special architectural and historic interest of this Listed Building is safeguarded.

The method of cleaning hereby approved as part of this permission shall be via water cleaning only and not by the use of chemicals, pressure or mechanical methods. Reason: In order that the special architectural and historic interest of this Listed Building is safeguarded.

Condition 1 (Contamination) - The applicant is informed that the submitted details, as set out above, are agreed and satisfy Planning Condition 1 of planning permission 18/12700/PNSR.Please note however that as a part approval cannot be issued, these details will need to be resubmitted with any revisions to unacceptable conditions that also form part of this application.

The proposal fails to ensure satisfactory Secure Cycle Parking in accordance with the Sustainable Transport SPD and the layout criteria in outlined in Appendix 6 and Policy DM8 of the LDF Core Strategy (2012).The application is advised to resubmit a new application in accordance with the above.

The fee exemption does not apply because the previous application was for Certificate of Lawful Development and this new application is a planning application.The fee required for your planning application is Â£462.  Payment can be made via either our Contact Centre on 0208 547 5002, or online via the Kingston council website.
The submitted new block plan has an incorrect scale bar. Please submit the proposed block plan with the correct scale bar.

The submitted new set of drawings floor plans, roof plan, and elevations have 1:100 as a scale but the provided dimensions in the drawings do not measure to 1:100. Please revise the drawings with the correct scale.
